audience: Individuals and professionals seeking to enhance productivity and creativity through better note management

sections.intent: Hook the audience and establish context
keyPoints: Introduction to Muse as a revolutionary tool for thought management
Highlight the importance of capturing and utilizing thoughts effectively
Present the concept of Muse as a solution to common productivity challenges
Notes are often unorganized and underutilized, leading to lost insights
72% of people have fleeting ideas that go uncaptured
Significant productivity costs associated with searching for lost information

sections.intent: Present Muse as the innovative solution
keyPoints: Muse acts as a Thought Garden, transforming passive note-taking into proactive knowledge creation
Utilizes proprietary LLMs to build a personalized knowledge graph
Features include frictionless input, reasoning-empowered recall, and proactive content generation
Contextual understanding through smart surfacing of notes
Proactive content generation, creating deliverables from user inputs
Augmented retrieval by analyzing notes in relation to each other

sections.intent: Outline how Muse will generate revenue
keyPoints: Subscription-based model for individual and enterprise users
Potential partnerships with productivity tools and platforms
Freemium model to attract initial users with premium features available

sections.intent: Show evidence of interest or early success
keyPoints: Initial user feedback indicating high satisfaction and engagement
Beta testing results showing improved productivity metrics
Growing community of users sharing their experiences and use cases

sections.intent: Detail the plan for launching Muse
keyPoints: Targeted marketing campaigns focusing on productivity enthusiasts
Leverage social media and content marketing to build awareness
Partnerships with influencers in the productivity and tech space

sections.intent: Introduce the founding team and their expertise
keyPoints: Founders with backgrounds in AI, productivity, and user experience design
Advisory board consisting of industry experts and thought leaders
Commitment to continuous improvement and user feedback integration

sections.intent: Clearly state what is being requested from the audience
keyPoints: Seeking investment to support product development and marketing efforts
Looking for strategic partnerships to enhance product offerings
Requesting feedback and support from the audience to refine the product
